feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Data Migration Cockpit reporting data already migrated
entry.content:
Data Migration Cockpit issue with multiple cycles of the same object failing with DMC reporting data already migrated.

Following scenario:
Using DMC with staging tables (using own tool to stage the data, not file upload).
You are doing a Master Data migration, Business Partner, Create Scenario.
You stage a data set and add a key for the tables, let's say BP_0001.
You migrated the entry successfully but found errors. 
You truncate the staged data and insert the data again (with some corrections or additions).  There is no problem doing that as the earlier key was removed - so the entries were NOT adjusted.

Now trying to re-run the same ("new") data which would create a new BP.
The DMC remembers somehow that the key was migrated and does not allow it. 
Questions:

  1. Does the migration need to be reset?
  2. Should the deletion be only done from DMC and not the 3rd party staging tool? When deleting all instances in DMC it might clean out more consistently that previous migrated information and keys?
  3. Any additional table where DMC stores those already migrated keys? If so why and where?

Other comments are suggestions?
Above scenario gets more complex for extending master data but those are in my view typical use cases in project migration cycles.

Thanks for answers, helps and ideas in advance.

entry.title: SLT ISSUE IN S4HANA MIGRATION
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

We have a scenario where our ECC system is being migrated to S/4HANA. In the current setup, data from ECC is replicated to a HANA database using SLT.

Post-migration, the SLT source system will be updated to S/4HANA. We have more than 800 tables being replicated from ECC to HANA today, and after migration, we need to continue replicating these tables (wherever they still exist and are not obsolete in S/4HANA).

Has anyone worked on a similar scenario and can share:

Cutover / data load strategy for such a large volume of tables

Challenges faced during replication from S/4HANA, especially regarding:

Data type mismatches between source and target

Additional fields appearing in S/4 tables

Handling obsolete or replaced tables

 

Any insights, lessons learned, or best practices would be really helpful.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Best Practices for SAP Sales Cloud V2 Standalone Setup with Later Integration to SAP S/4HANA
entry.content:
Hello Community,

we are planning to implement SAP Sales Cloud V2 in a standalone setup, with the plan to integrate with SAP S/4HANA (OnPrem) at a later stage.
I am looking for recommendations and best practices on how to prepare for this scenario, especially with regard to:

  • Organizational structures: How should Sales Units be modeled in Sales Cloud V2 if S/4HANA (Sales Org, Distribution Channel, Sales Area) will become the leading system later on?

  • Master Data: How to best manage Accounts, Contacts, and Products in the standalone phase to avoid major rework when integrating later?

  • Data migration / mapping: Are there recommended approaches to ensure smooth alignment of IDs, number ranges, or code lists between Sales Cloud V2 and S/4HANA once the integration is activated?

We would like to avoid building up data models or structures in Sales Cloud that will cause issues during the transition to S/4.

Has anyone gone through a similar journey (standalone Sales Cloud first, later S/4HANA integration) and can share lessons learned or pitfalls? Any official SAP resources you would recommend are also very welcome.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Inspection setup audit log Issue
entry.content:
Hi,

When we perform MM02, the inspection setup log is generated correctly. However, when we try to delete an inspection setup line item using a BAPI, the change log is not generated in Display Changes.

Could you please let us know if there is any standard BAPI available that can generate change logs when deleting an existing inspection setup line item

Thanks

entry.title: When will be release timing of SAP S/4HANA 2025 and SP01 ?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I have two questions regarding SAP S/4HANA 2025:

• Could you please provide information about the release timing of SAP S/4HANA 2025? (I understand it's expected to be around October 2025)

• Is my understanding correct that SP01 would be released approximately 6 months after the 2025 release?

I would appreciate any official information or insights from the community regarding these release timelines.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

entry.title: SAP MBC - OAUTH 2.0 mTLS configuration on ERP side
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are about to start the onboarding process for SAP Multi-bank connectivity, but we have some questions how to set up the OAUTH 2.0 mTLS configuration (for a connection between our S4HANA on-premse system to SAP Identity service / SAP  MBC).

In the configuration guide additional info is given how to set up in connector for SAP Multi-Bank Connectivity using transaction OA2C_CONFIG

See for example: https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_MULTI_BANK_CONNECTIVITY/a0fb81f60461411ba33bc586aecd3039/23fd4011e67c4981a37a06b325991612.html?locale=en-US 

That transaction seems to be obsolete in our system (S4HANA 2024). Other options are transaction OAUTH2_config (instead of OA2C_CONFIG) or implement new dynro (note 3532137), but the required settings are different with the information in the configuration documentation.

Anyone has some tips how to setup OAUTH 2.0  for S4HANA 2024 systems for SAP MBC?

entry.title: Dump BEHAVIOR_ILLEGAL_STMT_IN_CALL
entry.content:
Hello,

I am working on an On-Premise S/4HANA system and developing an application using the language version "ABAP for Cloud Development".

I am currently using the released BAdI FKK_BADI_RETURN_LOT (FKK_EVENT_0295). For this purpose, I have added the function module FKK_SAMPLE_0295_CLOUD_BADI to event 295 in FQ-Events and created a BAdI implementation. 

Within this implementation, I attempt to write data to the database with the following statement:

INSERT zal000 FROM ls_data.

However, this leads to a short dump. Interestingly, when I execute the same logic in a BAdI implementation developed with the language version "Standard-ABAP", it works without any issues.

Question:
Where can I find official documentation that indicates whether a BAdI runs in the "Save" or "Late Save" phase in the context of ABAP for Cloud Development?

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,

A. Schulz

entry.title: ODATA call to RODPS_REPL_ODP_GET_DETAL for std CDS view gets cs_sy_move_cast_error
entry.content:
Hi - I am calling the ODP context ABAP_CDS with ODP name IFIGLACCTLIR$F (ACDOCA)  via Synapse Analytics - however Synapse never gets a response - When using external debugging the sap side is getting a cs_sy_move_cast_error in RODPS_REPL_ODP_GET_DETAL line 134.. 

Only via external - ODATA - if I execute the FM directly in S/4 all works fine: 

I_SUBSCRIBER_TYPE = RSODP_ODATA

I_CONTEXT =  ABAP_CDS

I_ODPNAME = IFIGLACCTLIR$F

I_TYPEVERSION = 0

I_HIER_FLATTENING = NULL

This is happening on our production system - but can replicate in sandbox as well.

entry.title: /SDF/SMONの有効WP
entry.content:
ご担当者様

/SDF/SMONの有効WPの定義をご教示ください、
有効WPとはその時点で実行中のワークプロセスの合計でよいでしょうか？

有効WPには待機中のワークプロセスは含まれないという理解ですが、
これは正しいでしょうか。
弊社環境の/SDF/SMONの画面ショットを添付します。
この例だと8/29午前3:30以降、有効WPが3~4なので実行中のものが3~4で
待機中のワークプロセスが非常にあるという理解です。




------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: [S/4 hana] How can I append to /SAPAPO/MATIO table?
entry.content:
Hi Everyone!

Context:

I am trying to pass an outbound IDoc into another system, thus becoming an Inbound IDoc, this Inbound IDoc passes values, mara-rmatp_long and marc-herkl values, which is needed to be passed into /SAPAPO/MATIO fields

Is there an bapi/fm I can use for this?

these fields are currently being used in /sapapo/mat1 transactions as:

city of origin (/sapapo/matio-herkl) 

 

refP for Pack (/sapapo/matio-rmatp)

 

what I tried:

1. Append these values into mara table, but nothing is happening.

2. Directly update the /sapapo/matio

entry.title: Controlling User Access to Projects Across Cost Centers in S/4HANA
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We have global users who are assigned to a specific cost center (XYZ). However, these users need access to certain projects that belong to different cost centers, not all projects falling under these different cost centers. Could you please advise how this can be achieved?

So in the end, we want to restrict user access to projects regardless of the cost center they or projects belong to.

Thanks in advance,

Alp

entry.title: Program RMFPLA01 revokes the PO approval After upgrading to S/4 FPS03 2023
entry.content:
After upgrading to S/4 FPS03 2023 which was released on February 26, 2025.  on top of S/4 HANA Cloud private. , the release strategy of POs is revoked when the PO, which is released via the workflow, is opened in ME22 and the delivery date is changed. 

The issue is that the program RMFPLA01 for invoicing plan is calling ME22 in background. Consequently,  the PO approval is revoked as soon as the program RMFPLA01 runs.

Neither custom code nor implicit enhancements are used.

entry.title: SQ01 dynamic date and time filters with timestamps
entry.content:
Hi,

 

SAP EWM tables often use timestamps (e.g. /SCWM/ORDIM_C).

Because of that I can't use dynamic date and time filter with SQ01 Queries.

 

Are there any possibilities to use dynamic date and time filters here?

 

Best regards

Jonas

entry.title: Delivery split BOM component
entry.content:
Hi Gurus,

i have a sales order with different items and shipping points. The sales order is composed by standard item with a specific shipping point and BOM materials with a different shipping point. During the delivery creation the system split only the father materials of the BOM, so i have standard items with a shipping point and all the components with another one. So the delivery split is correctly working only for the father material of the BOM and not for the components. How to resolve it?

It is necessary create a custom routine for the delivery batch split?

Many thanks
